[He]374-he has a heart of ice ... but for [her]375-her , [he]374-he 'd burn [the world]376-the world .

[Alex Volkov]98-alex is [a devil blessed with the face of an angel]377-a devil blessed with the face of an angel and cursed with a past [he]98-alex canâ€ ™ t escape .

Driven by a tragedy that has haunted [him]98-alex for most of [his]98-alex life , [his]98-alex ruthless pursuits for success and vengeance leave little room for matters of the heart .

But when heâ€ ™ s forced to look after [[his]98-alex best friendâ€ ™ s sister]378-his best friendâ€ ™ s sister , [he]98-alex starts to feel something in [his]98-alex chest :

A crack . A melt . A fire that could end [his]98-alex world as [he]98-alex knew it .

* * *

[Ava Chen]99-ava is a free spirit trapped by nightmares of a childhood [she]99-ava canâ€ ™ t remember .

[Her]99-ava brotherâ€ ™ [s best friend]380-s best friend . [[Her]99-ava neighbor]381-her neighbor . [[Her]99-ava savior]382-her savior and [her]99-ava downfall .

[Theirs]383-theirs is a love that was never supposed to happenâ€”but when it does , it unleashes secrets that could destroy [them]383-theirs bothâ€ ¦ and everything [they]383-theirs hold dear .[383-theirs]

1

Ava

There were worse things than being stranded in the middle of nowhere during a rainstorm . For example , [I]0-i could be running from a rabid bear intent on mauling [me]0-i into the next century . Or [I]0-i could be tied to a chair in [a dark basement]384-a dark basement and forced to listen to [Aquaâ€]100-aquaâ€ ™ s â€œBarbie Girlâ€ on repeat until Iâ€ ™ d rather gnaw off [my]0-i arm than hear the songâ€ ™ s eponymous phrase again . But just because things could be worse didnâ€ ™ t mean [they]385-they didnâ€ ™ t suck .

Stop . Think positive thoughts .

[â€œAn Uber]101-â€œan uber will show upâ€ ¦ now . â€ [I]0-i stared at [my]0-i phone , biting back [my]0-i frustration when the app reassured [me]0-i it was â€œfinding [my]0-i rideâ€ , the way it had been for the past half hour . Normally , [Iâ€]106-iâ€ ™ d be less stressed about the situation because hey , at least [I]0-i had a working phone and [a bus shelter]386-a bus shelter to keep [me]0-i mostly dry from the pounding rain . But [Joshâ€]103-alex ™ s farewell party was starting in an hour , [I]0-i had yet to pick up [his]103-alex surprise cake from [the bakery]387-the bakery , and it would be dark soon . [I]0-i may be [a glass half full kinda gal]388-a glass half full kinda gal , but [I]0-i wasnâ€ ™ t [an idiot]389-an idiot . [The bus that stopped at]392-the bus that stopped at [this location]393-this location didnâ€ ™ t run on the weekends , and most of [[my]0-i friends]394-my friends didnâ€ ™ t own [a car]395-a car . [Bridget]105-bridget had car service , but [she]105-bridget was at [an embassy event]396-an embassy event until seven . [Uber]101-â€œan uber wasnâ€ ™ t working , and [I]0-i hadnâ€ ™ t seen [a single car]397-a single car pass by since the rain started . Not that [I]0-i would hitchhike , anywayâ€”Iâ€ ™ ve watched horror movies , thank [you]2512-you very much . [I]0-i only had one option leftâ€”one[0-i] [I]0-i really didnâ€ ™ t want to takeâ€”but [beggars]2513-beggars couldnâ€ ™ t be [choosers]2514-choosers . [I]0-i pulled up the contact in [my]0-i phone , said a silent prayer , and pressed the call button . One ring . Two rings . Three .[0-i]

Come on , pick up . Or not . [I]0-i wasnâ€ ™ t sure which would be worseâ€”getting murdered or dealing with [[my]0-i brother]2515-my brother . About [the Author

Ana Huang]365-the author ana huang is an author of primarily steamy New Adult and contemporary romance . [Her]365-the author ana huang books contain diverse characters and emotional , sometimes twisty roads toward HEAs ( with plenty of banter and spice sprinkled in ) . Besides reading and writing , [Ana]365-the author ana huang loves traveling , is obsessed with hot chocolate , and has multiple relationships with [fictional boyfriends]2508-fictional boyfriends .
